12.author: edited by Bill Black ; artwork by Robert Hayward Webb.

contents.author: by Bill Black and Bill Feret. 8 p.
contents.title: Introduction: "Sheena Queen of the Jungle"

notes: "Classic adventures starring the sexy savage beauty from Fiction House comics!"

  • Adventures of Tom Sherrill (issues 1-8)

  • The Hawk (issues 9-77, 79-160)
  • Hawks of the Seas (issues 1-8)
  • The Hunchback of Notre Dame (issues 1-8)
  • Inspector Dayton (issues 1-63)
  • Joe Penner (issue 3)
  • Lightning (issues 15-41)
  • Long Bow (issues 131-159)
  • Midnight, Wild Black Stallion (issues 25-65)
  • Modern Planes and Model Building (issues 1-6)
  • Peter Pupp (issues 1-25)
  • Sheena, Queen of the Jungle (issues 1-167)
  • Sky Girl (issues 68-78, 80-130)
  • Space Rangers (issue 167)
  • Space Scout (issues 157-163)
  • Spencer Steel (issues 1-14)
  • Star Pirate (issues 164-165)
  • Stuart Taylor (issues 9-78, 84-140)
  • Suicide Smith (issue 163)
  • Tom, Dick and Harry (issues 22-52)
  • War Aces (issue 160)
  • Wilton of the West (issues 1-24)
  • ZX-5 Spies in Action (issues 1-51, 53-77, 79-140)
This list originates from the one in Howard Keltner's Index to Golden Age Comic Books (Detroit, Mich.: J. Bails, 1976)
